text: Petro Dode (born 17 April 1924) is an Albanian politician. He was Chairman of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania from 19 February 1987 to 15 April 1991. \- Republika e Shqipërisë KUVEND. Tiranë 2005 He was born in Pobickë, Kolonjë. He was also first candidate of the Central Committee (CC) of the Labour Party of Albania (PPSh).The Albanian Communist Party From Its Foundation Up To Its Fourth Congress (9. Dezember 1960) ==References== Category:Chairpersons of the Parliament of Albania Category:Communists Category:1924 births Category:Living people
title: Petro Dode
